title: Not to be racist, but why do white girls get box braids? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because they like them? Look, not everyone is trying to disrespect other cultures or to show superiority in some way. As long as you don't disrespect other cultures it's completely fine to use their elements. Why they are getting box braids is probably because they like them and there is nothing wrong with that. In the most cases it's cultural appreciation.
